verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, Thy blood and righteousness My beauty are, my glorious dress: â€™Midst flaming worlds, in these arrayed, With joy shall I lift up my head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord, I believe the precious blood Which at the mercy-seat of God For ever doth for sinners plead, For me, even for my soul, was shed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lord, I believe, were sinners more Than sands upon the ocean shore, You have for all a ransom paid, For all a full atonement made.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Bold shall I stand in that great day; For who aught to my charge shall lay? Fully, by Thee, absolved I am from sin and fear, from guilt and shame.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: This spotless robe the same appears When ruined nature sinks in years: No age can change its constant hue; Its glory is forever new.

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: Thou God of power, Thou God of love, Let the whole world Thy mercy prove: Their beauty this, their glorious dress, Jesus the Lord, our righteousness.
